Room.Name: Lyanden Road Toll House
Room.ShortDescription: This is a major entry/exit for the great Lyanden Road, which connects to the city of Oceancrest to the west and smaller cities to the east.
Room.LongDescription: A tax collector is stationed here, with a small garrison of troops. He will not let you pass until you have paid a toll tax for the use of the road. The bored militia would be very interested in anyone who did not pay.
